text: Miklagard – The History of the Vikings Volume 2 is an album by power metal band Rebellion, and the second part in their Viking trilogy. It is the first album with female guitarist Simone Wenzel. The vocals on "Vi seglar mot Miklagard" (Swedish: "We're Sailing to Miklagard") are contributed by Charles Rytkönen (Morgana Lefay). ==Track listing== #"Vi seglar mot Miklagard" – 1:49 #"Sweden" – 4:22 #"Free" – 5:04 #"On the Edge of Life" – 5:59 #"Ulfberth" – 4:42 #"The Rus" – 4:06 #"Kiew" – 4:31 #"Aifur" – 4:08 #"Taste of Steel" – 3:27 #"God of Thunder" – 5:23 #"Our Backs to the Wind" – 5:25 #"Miklagard" – 4:34 #"The Uprising" – 7:07 All music written by Lulis. All lyrics written by Göttlich, except: 1. by Rytkönen, 12. by Göttlich & Seifert, 13. by Seifert. ==Album line-up== * Michael Seifert — vocals * Uwe Lulis — guitars * Simone Wenzel — guitars * Tomi Göttlich — bass * Gerd Lücking — drums Category:2007 albums Category:Rebellion (band) albums Category:Concept albums Category:Massacre Records albums Category:Sequel albums
title: Miklagard – The History of the Vikings Volume 2
